#summary Known bugs in AddressSanitizer

=Globals=
  * Globals (`-asan-globals=1`) may break if the program is a mix of PIC and non-PIC objects. issue 3.
  * Globals are disabled on Mac (for now)

=Unaligned accesses=
There is a known [http://code.google.com/p/address-sanitizer/wiki/AddressSanitizerAlgorithm#Unaligned_accesses issue with unaligned accesses] (ASan may miss some rare bugs).
